# Welcome

This online supplemement presents the analysis code and results for the paper "Further investigation of solitude as tool for affective self-regulation: EMA study investigating changes in affect when people spend time alone" by Nguyen and colleagues. The data was pre-registered and the data can be downloaded from the OSF (https://osf.io/wuqy9/). The pre-print associated with this paper can be found at INSERT LOCATION. This website is hosted on github and can be downloaded at https://github.com/mprimbs/Nguyen-et-al.
